item.title: Jeremy Thomas Reflects on His Rise “at the Tail End” of Cinema’s Golden Age: “I Can’t Find Somebody to Give Me 40 Million Bucks Anymore”
item.description: The legendary producer — an Oscar winner for 1987’s ‘The Last Emperor’ — also spoke about hating Harvey Weinstein at an Edinburgh Film Festival session: “I took [it to] a shocking level of rudeness.”
